mapper.select: select member.memberId, member.emailAccount, member.emailDomain, member.password, member.name, member.age, member.sex, member.authorization, member.refreshToken, member_address.address, member_address.dongCode, member.createdTime, member.updatedTime from member left join member_address on member.memberId = member_address.memberId where member.deletedTime is null and member.emailAccount = #{emailAccount} and member.emailDomain = #{emailDomain}
mapper.insert: insert into member (emailAccount, emailDomain, password, name, age, sex, authorization) values (#{emailAccount}, #{emailDomain}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, 0)
